block.p: Erica Lauren Ottenberg and Benjamin Douglas Victor Sirota were married last evening at the Hotel Monaco in Washington. Rabbi Harold White officiated.

The bride, 28, is keeping her name. She is a writer of promotions for programs at Nickelodeon, the cable television network for children. She graduated from Northwestern. She is a daughter of Vivian and Lee Ottenberg of Rockville, Md.

The bride, 28, is keeping her name. She is a writer of promotions for programs at Nickelodeon, the cable television network for children. She graduated from Northwestern. She is a daughter of Vivian and Lee Ottenberg of Rockville, Md.

The bridegroom, also 28, is a litigation associate at Debevoise & Plimpton, the New York law firm. He graduated from Princeton and received a law degree with honors from the University of Chicago. He is the son of Joan and Fredric Sirota of Morristown, N.J.
